params._cToken: The address of the corresponding cToken on the Compound protocol (e.g., cDAI)
params._token: The address of the ERC20 token that will be supplied (e.g., DAI)

supply(uint256).custom:error: MintFailed Reverts if the minting of cTokens fails (i.e., if the result is not 0)
supply(uint256).details: Transfers the specified amount of tokens from the user, approves the cToken contract to spend the tokens, and mints cTokens

params._amount: The amount of the ERC20 token to supply (in the smallest unit, considering decimals)

returns._0: The result of the mint operation (0 indicates success)

cToken().notice: The cToken representing the supplied ERC20 token on the Compound protocol

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the contract with the ERC20 token and corresponding cToken addresses

supply(uint256).notice: Supply a specified amount of the ERC20 token to the Compound protocol

token().notice: The underlying ERC20 token that will be supplied to the Compound protocol
